title: HoP 392 - John Sellars on Lipsius and Early Modern Stoicism
itunes:title: HoP 392 - John Sellars on Lipsius and Early Modern Stoicism
description: John Sellars returns to the podcast to discuss Lipsius' work on Seneca and the early modern Neo-Stoic movement.
